resources.string: Calling the MODs API wasn't successful
Generate lrc file for the downloaded songs if found. Requires 'Synced' lyric provider to be enabled.

Install pre-release builds to preview new features and changes.
There will be some instability in these versions, so please don't hesitate to give us feedback if you experience any problems to help us improve the app for the future.
Your Android version or your granted permissions won't allow you to make downloads away from the "Downloads" or "Documents" folders
Change how many downloads at a time can be running. This doesn't apply on single track downloads.
Couldn't match the URL from clipboard
You won't be able to select the option for downloading to an SD until you don't select a path by clicking on the button.
